info.description: This is a production-ready HTTP API in Go for a manga reading platform.
info.title: Manga-Dex-Style API

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns JWT access and refresh tokens.
Creates a new user account with a default 'User' role.

get.description: Retrieves details for a single chapter.
get.summary: Get a single chapter by ID

put.description: Updates the details of a specific chapter. Requires 'chapters:manage' permission.

delete.description: Deletes a specific chapter. Requires 'chapters:manage' permission.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of comments for a specific chapter.

post.description: Adds a new comment to a specific chapter.
post.summary: Post a comment on a chapter

post.description: Uploads one or more image files for a chapter. Requires 'chapters:manage' permission.

parameters.description: Image files for the chapter pages. Can be sent multiple times.
parameters.name: pages

post.description: Marks a chapter as read for the current user.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated and filtered list of manga.

parameters.description: Full-text search query for title and description
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: Filter by comma-separated genre names (e.g., Action,Fantasy)
parameters.name: genres

post.description: Adds a new manga to the catalog. Requires 'manga:manage' permission.

get.description: Retrieves details for a single manga, including its genres.
get.summary: Get a single manga by ID

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of comments for a specific manga.

post.description: Adds a new comment to a specific manga.
post.summary: Post a comment on a manga

post.description: Adds or removes a manga from the current user's favorites list.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of chapters for a specific manga.

post.description: Adds a new chapter to a specific manga. Requires 'chapters:manage' permission.

get.description: Retrieves the profile information for the currently authenticated user.
Retrieves a paginated list of the current user's favorite manga.
Retrieves a list of all chapters marked as read by the current user.

coverImageURL.description: Use a pointer to handle NULL values

pages.description: Initially, pages might be empty before upload

isFavorited.description: True if the manga is now a favorite, false if it was removed.

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and a JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
